oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WSM Variety Award Presentation - 1949-06-01 (copy) - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program aimed at George Rosen of Variety magazine to celebrate winning the 1948 Variety Award for 'How To Run A Radio Station'. Part two of four, this part concludes the section on vocalists as well as covering WSM's children's programming and public service programs. This disc is a duplicate of TR001246_2.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Fisk University Choir
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer introduces the Fisk University Choir -- Rise, Shine, For Thy Light Is A-Coming (Fisk University Choir) -- Announcer introduces WSM musicians -- Outline of WSM programs -- Announcer talks about Wormwood Forest -- Wormwood Forest excerpt -- Tennessee Saturday Night (excerpt) (Red Foley) -- Announcer talks about WSM's public service programs -- Outline of WSM public service programs -- Announcer talks about Noontime Neighbors -- Noontime Neighbors excerpt -- Tennessee Saturday Night (excerpt) (Red Foley) -- Announcer talks about WSM's farming programs -- Farm market report excerpt -- Announcer talks about In The Realm Of Science [title unconfirmed] -- In The Realm Of Science [title unconfirmed] excerpt -- Tennessee Saturday Night (excerpt) (Red Foley) -- Announcer talks about A Woman Looks At The News -- A Woman Looks At The News excerpt -- Announcer talks about You And Your Home -- You And Your Home excerpt -- Announcer talks about The Old Guide -- The Old Guide excerpt -- Announcer talks about The Story Of A House [title unconfirmed] -- The Story Of A House [title unconfirmed] excerpt -- Announcer talks about Pensacola Navy training -- Excerpt from Pensacola Navy training coverage -- Announcer talks about the US army -- Excerpt from army parachute jump coverage -- Announcer talks about Camp Campbell army base -- Excerpt from Camp Campbell coverage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Fisk University. Choir; Johnson, Harold (Musician); Goodman, Lawrence (Pianist); Wormwood forest (Radio program); Tichenor, Tom; Noontime neighbors (Radio program); Cooney, Marjorie; Woman looks at the news (Radio program); You and your home (Radio program); Old Guide (Radio program)
